changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]New![/b] Album Gridview without palette.
[b]New![/b] Transitions when loading art and palette colors. It fades in from black/grey.
[b]New![/b] Album Gridview now has configurable columns.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Options such as view as, and columns, now only apply to their things. only visible on album tab, and only visible on album gridview, respectively.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Album Listview is now efficient
[i]Improvement[/i] - Overflow menus are no longer buggy

[i]Improvement[/i] - Colors for the status bar and the AppBar on lollipop have been corrected if there was no album art. Previously it had the darker color as the AppBar, which is the opposite of what it should be, and now is.

Basic implementation of album view for artist. However it did break the songs listing for them. Also ([i]Bug[/i] it doesn't load albums that contains a song(s) made by the artist, it only loads it if the album is considered to be made by that artist)
Probably more things. I honestly cannot remember, it's 3AM.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Album Art now loads efficiently. And the Color Pallete is implemented.
[i]Improvement[/i] - AppBar is now fully visible on KitKat, previously was sunk into the statusbar.
Switched the Artist tab display art over to a seed-based color generator. No longer random.
[i]Bug[/i] - Occasionally Album Art with color will have a monochrome grid palette.

[b]Todo:[/b] Improve the gridview items, setup the gridview to be recognized by the tabs, so that the toolbar will sink on scrolling, Album List view needs to be changed to the efficient loading, if an artist name starts with "The" the icon needs to not be a "T", setup a settings activity, implement a gridview for the artist panel, other things...
[b]New![/b] Album Grid View, swap between the two via the overflow menu. (Only works while on the album tab)
[b]New![/b] Overflow menus on most of the views. Currently only works on the album views, and it only shows toast messages.
[b]New![/b] Tap on the album art while in the Album View, it loads an activity with the entire album art showing.
[b]New![/b] In the album view, go into the overflow menu, there is an option to share the details about that album. It will eventually get more detailed.
Changed the versioning to reflect my current views, PA for Pre-Alpha.
Hamburger icon now opens the drawer when clicked.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Fixed the about Libraries page works now, and is styled correctly.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Fixed the card size issue of the Artist tab and the Albums tab.
[b]New![/b] Album view now shows the artist for the songs.
[b]New![/b] Fast Scroll bar - expect bugs.
[b]New![/b] If there is no artist or album art, an icon is generated with the first letter and a random color from the material palette.
[b]New![/b] Album art loads in the Album view now!
Album View is practically finished, need to fix the Art loading in the Banner.
NavDrawer text is done, the only working function is the Changelog, which will eventually move to the Settings Page.
Artist Panel is almost done.
Planning on adding an Album list for the artist view.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Songs tab is now a recycler-view along with the rest of the tabs.
[b]New![/b] Now Playing panel shell is there. Access via the Snackbar from the main FAB.
[b]Todo:[/b] Fix the album art in the Album view([b]Done[/b]), implement Last.fm, and change the artists view art from a square to circle, and the default icon to a person.
[b]New![/b] Album view is implemented, along with album art, expect bugs.
[b]New![/b] NavDrawer, not nearly setup yet.
Music no longer plays, it will be re-implemented more efficiently in the near future.
Artist Panel only reacts with a toast.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Changed anything I could over to the new v22 support library, ex. the Tab Bars, the Nav Drawer, and the FAB's.
[b]New![/] Music can be played, but not paused or controlled. Stop it via the overflow menu.
Changed the looks of the tab panel.
FAB is on all tabs now.
Beginnings of album view is there.
[b]Todo:[/b] Each panel needs a scrollbar that can scroll through quickly alphabetically
[i]Improvement[/i] - Tab menu is custom now.
[i]Improvement[/i] - FAB stays on screen now.
[i]Improvement[/i] - Tabs underline is now white.
[b]New![/b] The artist page now has a FAB Toolbar as featured in the new Material Design Specs.
[b]New![/b] Added Ripple effect for what will hopefully be the animation for the Now Playing Panel.
[b]New![/b] Started tracking versions.
